about_the_game:
Embark on a boundless open world adventure across the sprawling expanse of over 40 square miles nestled within the majestic Preseli mountains in Wales. Decode enigmatic messages etched in an ancient language, unveiling secrets as old as time itself. Harness the primal magic of totem animals, summoning their power to aid in your quest for survival amidst the untamed wilderness. Traverse a landscape steeped in the echoes of our forebears, each corner brimming with the whispers of forgotten tales. Inspired by a remarkable true story, let the flames of passion and destiny ignite your dreams as you journey through this immersive odyssey.

But remember, Let Fire guides your dreams

FEATURES

  • Immersive Exploration: Venture into a vast open world spanning over 40 square miles, set within the mystical Preseli mountains of Wales.
  • Epic Journey: Discover a landscape filled with the whispers of our ancestors.
  • Ancient Mysteries: Uncover enigmatic messages in an ancient language, revealing secrets to aid your journey.
  • Totemic Magic: Harness the primal power of totem animals to aid in survival, hunting, foraging, and unraveling the mysteries of the land.
  • Mythical Beings and Legends: Encounter mythical creatures holding the keys to unlocking the secrets of living a balanced life.
  • Dynamic Storytelling: Experience a captivating narrative inspired by a true story.
  • Sacred Practices: Engage in sacred practices designed to tether the mind and maintain harmony with nature, drawing upon ancient wisdom to guide your path.
  • Environmental Interaction: Interact with a living, breathing world, where every action influences the balance between you and the natural world.
  • Dream-Based Guidance: Let the Fire guide your dreams, leading you to uncover hidden truths and awaken the dormant Dragon, whose wisdom holds the key to restoring harmony.
  • Visual Splendor: Immerse yourself in stunning visuals and atmospheric landscapes, bringing the ancient world to life with unparalleled beauty and depth.
  • Meaningful Choices: Navigate moral dilemmas and ethical quandaries as you strive to find your way through the world.

In a time long forgotten, shortly after the world was sung into existence by the Gods, humanity lived in harmony with nature, attuned to the ebb and flow of life's cycles. Yet, unlike other creatures, they found themselves vulnerable to the harsh elements, lacking the fur, speed, or claws to thrive effortlessly.

Observing their struggles, the Gods convened with the spirits of the land—oceans, mountains, plants, and animals—and struck a pact. Each creature would bestow upon humanity its unique gifts, from warmth to sustenance, and even guidance, in exchange for reverence and stewardship. Thus, the totemic bond between humans and the natural world was forged.

Recognizing the potential for imbalance in the human mind, the Gods bestowed upon them a special gift—the ability to reason and reflect. However, to ensure this gift didn't lead to folly, they also introduced sacred rituals, intended to tether the mind to the rhythms of nature.

In those primordial times, when dragons soared the skies and mythical beings roamed freely, humanity thrived. The dragons, guardians of ancient wisdom, entrusted humanity with the secrets of a good life, should they ever be forgotten.

But as epochs passed, humanity's memory waned, and the allure of power led to discord and greed. Forgotten were the sacred rituals, and the once-mythical creatures faded into legend, waiting for a time of awakening.

As imbalance spread, nature itself rebelled, unleashing winds, floods, and Fire to restore equilibrium. In the wake of this upheaval, a new era emerged, fraught with uncertainty.

Now, in this age of renewal, whispers of the past echo in the dreams of a chosen few. Drawn to a land where the presence of the Gods lingers, guided by the flickering flame of Fire, you are one of these seekers.

Let the Fire illuminate your path as you journey to awaken the dormant Dragon and rediscover the forgotten secrets of a life in harmony with the world.

short_description: Uncover ancient secrets, summon totemic magic, decode enigmatic messages, and explore the majestic Preseli mountains of Wales in this open world adventure inspired by a true story. Dare to embark on this journey and rediscover the lost secrets of a life lived with purpose and meaning!
